abstract: A class that looks up address strings for the provided geographic coordinates.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this class to look up an address by a coordinate you provide. This example shows how to use a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Task] modifier on a SwiftUI view to reverse geocodes an array of coordinates to the corresponding addresses that MapKit returns in an array of [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapItem] objects.
